entry.string:
set -x file="$(pwd)/ABC.exe" pwd;
echo -e "
**************************** This is a Deploy JOB $file **************************** " if [[ -f "$file" ]]; then dt=$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H:%M) sudo cp -p $(pwd)/ABC.exe /home/ec2-user/jenkinsBackup/ABC_$dt.exe
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then file1="/home/ec2-user/jenkinsBackup/ABC_$dt.exe" if [[ -x "$file1" ]]; then echo -e " STEP 2: Deployment Successful - Build pushed to artifactory" echo " ARTIFACTORY_PATH: /home/ec2-user/jenkinsBackup/$file1" fi else echo -e "**************** ERROR ********************* " echo "Deployment failure - ABC.exe cannot be executed " echo -e "******************************************** " exit 1 fi else echo -e "**************** ERROR ********************* " echo "Deploy Build - ABC.exe notfound $file " echo -e "******************************************** " exit 1 fi
